item.title: B2-VISA-How-To
item.description: I plan to to have my parents visit me this following Febuary. Typically, Non-citizen need to have VISA to enter the US. To get VISA, we need to apply. Visitor Visa Official Guide According to the guide, the overall procedure will be: find the VISA type one needs to apply for; file online application; schedule an interview; pay application fee ;gather required document; attend the interview and finally get the
